mapper.select: /* QestnrDao.selectQestnrInfo */ SELECT A.QESTNRID , A.SITEID , A.QESTNR_KND_CD , A.QESTNR_NM , A.EXPLN , A.USE_YN FROM TB_CMM_QESTNR A WHERE QESTNRID = #{qestnrid}

/* QestnrDao.selectQitemList */
SELECT A.QITEMID , A.QESTNRID , A.QITEM_TYPE_CD , A.CN , A.ORDR FROM TB_CMM_QESTNR_QITEM A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.QESTNRID = #{qestnrid}
/* QestnrDao.selectQitemInfo */ SELECT A.QITEMID , A.QESTNRID , A.QESTNR_TYPE_CD , A.CN , A.EX_CNT , A.SCALE , A.ORDR , A.USE_YN FROM TB_CMM_QESTNR_QITEM A WHERE QITEMID = #{qitemid}
/* QestnrDao.selectNextQitemInfo */ SELECT A.QITEMID , A.ORDR FROM TB_CMM_QESTNR_QITEM A WHERE QESTNRID = #{qestnrid} AND ORDR = #{ordr} + 1
/* QestnrDao.selectNextQitemInfo */ SELECT A.QITEMID , A.ORDR FROM TB_CMM_QESTNR_QITEM A WHERE QESTNRID = #{qestnrid} AND ORDR = #{ordr} - 1
